lest_DECOMPOSE lest_DECOMPOSElest.hpp lest.hpplest_DECOMPOSE
#define lest_DECOMPOSE( expr) ( lest::expression_decomposer() << expr )
lest_EXPECT lest_EXPECTlest.hpp lest.hpplest_EXPECT
#define lest_EXPECT( expr)Value: do { \ try \ { \ if ( lest::result score = lest_DECOMPOSE( expr ) ) \ throw lest::failure{ lest_LOCATION, #expr, score.decomposition }; \ else if ( lest_env.pass() ) \ lest::report( lest_env.os, lest::passing{ lest_LOCATION, #expr, score.decomposition }, lest_env.context() ); \ } \ catch(...) \ { \ lest::inform( lest_LOCATION, #expr ); \ } \ } while ( lest::is_false() )
lest_EXPECT_NO_THROW lest_EXPECT_NO_THROWlest.hpp lest.hpplest_EXPECT_NO_THROW
#define lest_EXPECT_NO_THROW( expr)Value: do \ { \ try \ { \ expr; \ } \ catch (...) \ { \ lest::inform( lest_LOCATION, #expr ); \ } \ if ( lest_env.pass() ) \ lest::report( lest_env.os, lest::got_none( lest_LOCATION, #expr ), lest_env.context() ); \ } while ( lest::is_false() )
lest_EXPECT_NOT lest_EXPECT_NOTlest.hpp lest.hpplest_EXPECT_NOT
#define lest_EXPECT_NOT( expr)Value: do { \ try \ { \ if ( lest::result score = lest_DECOMPOSE( expr ) ) \ { \ if ( lest_env.pass() ) \ lest::report( lest_env.os, lest::passing{ lest_LOCATION, lest::not_expr( #expr ), lest::not_expr( score.decomposition ) }, lest_env.context() ); \ } \ else \ throw lest::failure{ lest_LOCATION, lest::not_expr( #expr ), lest::not_expr( score.decomposition ) }; \ } \ catch(...) \ { \ lest::inform( lest_LOCATION, lest::not_expr( #expr ) ); \ } \ } while ( lest::is_false() )
lest_EXPECT_THROWS lest_EXPECT_THROWSlest.hpp lest.hpplest_EXPECT_THROWS
#define lest_EXPECT_THROWS( expr)Value: do \ { \ try \ { \ expr; \ } \ catch (...) \ { \ if ( lest_env.pass() ) \ lest::report( lest_env.os, lest::got{ lest_LOCATION, #expr }, lest_env.context() ); \ break; \ } \ throw lest::expected{ lest_LOCATION, #expr }; \ } \ while ( lest::is_false() )
lest_EXPECT_THROWS_AS lest_EXPECT_THROWS_ASlest.hpp lest.hpplest_EXPECT_THROWS_AS
#define lest_EXPECT_THROWS_AS( expr, excpt)Value: do \ { \ try \ { \ expr; \ } \ catch ( excpt & ) \ { \ if ( lest_env.pass() ) \ lest::report( lest_env.os, lest::got{ lest_LOCATION, #expr, lest::of_type( #excpt ) }, lest_env.context() ); \ break; \ } \ catch (...) {} \ throw lest::expected{ lest_LOCATION, #expr, lest::of_type( #excpt ) }; \ } \ while ( lest::is_false() )
